Name: Spellarium 8 Match 3 Puzzle
About the game: Help Eric to build yet another beautiful location! As usual, we've made some improvements! - a new Jigsaw-like bonus game - you can replay some of the bonus games (Spot-the-difference, Solitaire, Mahjong, Jigsaws ) - now there are new types of coins, plus coins can drop down - now power-up explosions can remove colored tiles and tons of other improvements. Plus a new location to build. Plus a new bonus game. Plus new Match 3 gameplay.
